function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Racial minorities at higher risk of infection","Impact":"Increased spread and severity of contagious diseases in racial minority populations","Mitigation":"Equitable access to healthcare and public health measures, targeted outreach and awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Telemedicine, digital health tools for outreach and education","People":"Racial minorities, marginalized communities","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Socioeconomically deprived populations vulnerable to NPHIs targeting COVID-19","Impact":"Greater susceptibility to infection and adverse outcomes among socioeconomically deprived populations","Mitigation":"Equitable distribution of resources, targeted support for vulnerable communities, access to basic necessities","Technologies":"Mobile health clinics, community health workers, telemedicine for remote consultations","People":"Socioeconomically deprived populations, marginalized communities","Owner":"Government, NGOs, community organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of consensus on trust in NPHI effectiveness","Impact":"Uncertainty in policymaking, potential misallocation of resources, and lack of public confidence","Mitigation":"Comprehensive data analysis, transparency in decision-making, public engagement and education","Technologies":"Data analytics for impact assessment, public health communication tools for education and engagement","People":"Policy makers, public health officials, general population","Owner":"Government, public health institutions"}]}
